Bo \"Bandit\" Darville.Action: Is implied to be leading the obstacle course race among skilled truckers, referenced as a 'hot shot' who could be in the winner's circle by now.
Has a reputation that prompts others to want to see him accomplish something that 'can't be done', indicating confidence in his skills held by peers.
Lies in hammock ignoring others and gives a sarcastic response to an unfriendly greeting.
Casually lying in a hammock behind his beaten-up truck, showing a relaxed and confident demeanor even when confronted by others.
Lets others approach him without immediate reaction, maintaining control of the situation with minimal effort.
Asks Kyle to turn his head when he coughs, showing polite consideration.
Expresses that he participates in the Roadeo for the challenge and excitement, not for money.
Responds to Dickey's insult with humor and a smile, showing good-natured tolerance.
Refers to smuggling Coors Beer as something that 'bothers' him, indicating some moral awareness and sincerity.
Dismisses rumors of smuggling people as unfounded, attempting to maintain integrity.
Confidently states he can make the difficult run to Texarkana and back in twenty-eight hours, showing self-assurance and knowledge of his skills.
Offers a clear rationale for taking on challenges (the ecstasy of victory, not the money), demonstrating insight and motivation beyond simple gain.
Acknowledges the legality and risks involved in running Coors Beer east of Texas, indicating awareness of consequences.
Dismisses the monetary reward of the Truck Roadeo as insignificant, showing he is not motivated purely by money but by the challenge.
Smiles and uses humor and sarcasm when called 'yellow,' indicating confidence under social pressure.
Reacts curtly and evasively when asked about rumors of smuggling, avoiding full disclosure, which could suggest caution but also evasiveness.
Smiles at Dickey after noticing his thirst, showing an understanding and friendly gesture.
Questions Kyle about paying for gas before agreeing to the run, demonstrating cautiousness rather than immediate generosity.
Correctly recalls and amends the value of a Kenworth truck to seventy-two five (thousand), demonstrating precise knowledge and attention to detail.
Engages in negotiation about the deal on barley pop, carefully questioning payment for gas before agreeing, showing prudence and financial savvy.
Confidently manages the truck and prepares to take on the run, driving purposefully toward the starting line.
Displays some casual or playful interaction (smiling at Dickey), indicating social ease but does not strongly indicate competence or incompetence.
Confides over CB, trying to talk to 'Hot Pants' despite teasing and interruptions.
Stops truck at residential street and tries to enter house, greeting Waynette warmly with a compliment despite her blocking the way.
Uses a somewhat crude but playful line ('you sure do look foxy today') toward a woman who is married.
Acknowledges scrawny kid calling him 'Uncle Bandit' without reprimand or correction.
Avoids confrontation with Waynette by slipping past her to the bedroom rather than engaging in argument.
Shakes and tries to wake up Cledus with friendly urgency for a new opportunity.
Teases Cledus with humorous reference about kidnapping the Pope.
Takes advantage of a distraction (Waynette's yelling) to slip away quickly and prepare for an important job.
Quickly wakes up Cledus and efficiently gathers clothes and supplies for the run.
Underestimates the difficulty of the run by calling it a "hot run for big bucks" and referencing the 28-hour time limit in a casual tone.
Encourages Cledus and tries to motivate him by emphasizing the challenge and the reward (new Kenworth truck).
Sits watching Cledus' kids play football, showing attentiveness and a relaxed, non-judgmental presence.
Toots horn to get attention in a friendly, playful manner.
Picks up Fred the dog gently and places him in the sleeper compartment.
Encourages Cledus by pushing him to stay positive and confident during uncertain times.
Snaps fingers impatiently while waiting, showing mild irritability.
Confidently insists they will make it despite doubts, reviews the road map to plan the route, displays calm decisiveness under uncertainty.
Dismisses Cledus's concerns about getting caught with a pragmatic retort, showing situational awareness and risk acceptance.
Shows some impatience (snapping fingers) while waiting, which could indicate slight frustration but also urgency.
Shows impatience and nervousness about losing time but cooperates with Cledus's planning
Dismisses a safe and lawful plan as 'boring'
Takes initiative to 'run blocker' and operate the Shelby Cobra, working closely with Cledus
Coordinates complicated radio signals with Cledus, shows patience despite confusion.
Encourages Cledus to keep driving fast with confidence and excitement.
Explains their motivation as 'Because they said it couldn't be done.' showing a shared challenge spirit and camaraderie.
Communicates clearly and calmly with Cledus to ensure safety during police encounter.
Expresses mild frustration when finding the warehouse empty but remains composed.
Shares a moment of appreciation and camaraderie with Cledus about the beer, calling it 'redneck heaven.'
Takes control of the fork-lift, driving it recklessly and causing a crash, then jokes about the failure ('So much for whistling pigs').
Confidently starts and drives the fork-lift without prior confirmation of his skill.
Loses control of the fork-lift, crashes into cases, and is thrown off the seat.
Steps inside the warehouse, locates and activates the light switch quickly to illuminate the area.
Dismisses paying for damages by telling Cledus to bill Kyle.
Acknowledges schedule and communicates cooperatively with Cledus over CB.
Stops vehicle and allows wedding girl to get in after she waves and blocks the path.
Tells the Girl 'it was nothing' after helping her; listens patiently as Kate talks about her impulsive decision and insecurities without judgment.
Jokingly calls Kate's high-speed decision for marriage 'sound reasons for matrimony', showing lighthearted acceptance.
Keeps driving and does not press Kate during her fast-paced story, respecting her boundaries.
Drives away skillfully in a cloud of dust and squealing tires without hesitation after the girl enters the car.
Does not notice the van turning around to chase him, showing some lack of situational awareness.
Keeps driving confidently while engaging in conversation with Kate and quickly picks up on her personality and situation.
Offers a ride to Kate McConnell, a 'sweet, shy' singer, showing friendliness and willingness to help.
Refers to Kate with somewhat affectionate, protective language on the radio, indicating trust and sincerity.
No objection or interference when Cledus warns him about getting involved romantically, showing tolerance and trust in his own judgment.
Communicates clearly and confidently with Cledus over the CB, identifying his passenger and plan while maintaining situational awareness.
Engages in lighthearted banter over the CB despite the seriousness of the situation.
Engages in light banter and jokes with Kate, openly responding to her questions and teasing back.
Focuses primarily on a macho challenge and material reward (a truck), showing little emotional connection or concern for others.
Does not dismiss Kate’s concerns about getting killed, instead responds with a wry, somewhat humorous retort.
Neither tries to comfort nor reassure Kate about the dangers in a sincere way, maintains a tough exterior.
Confidently sets a challenging goal of making a high-speed round trip from Atlanta to Texarkana and back in 28 hours.
Expresses strong focus and urgency while driving, indicating skill and determination to meet a difficult deadline.
Dismisses potential dangers of the risky endeavor with nonchalance, suggesting possible overconfidence or underestimation of risk.
engages in light, playful conversation with Kate, including humor and teasing
evasively lies about involvement in Civil Rights movement when questioned
Warns Kate to fasten her seat belt before a dangerous maneuver.
Communicates with Cledus via CB to coordinate the run.

Notices the pursuing cop quickly using the rear view mirror, immediately warns Kate to fasten seat belt, performs a controlled four-wheel drift to avoid capture, communicates clearly with partner on CB, takes a dirt road to escape, showing skilled driving and quick decision-making.
Checks with Kate if they are clear after losing the pursuer, engaging in light conversation.
Immediately tries to protect Kate by swerving to avoid the tractor on the road, showing quick reflexes and concern.
Whips the Cobra around a hairpin turn and floors it to escape pursuers.
Quickly reacts to an unexpected obstacle (a tractor) by swerving and having Kate communicate on the CB.
Teases Kate gently after she compliments his driving, reciprocates with a compliment, shares a shy moment of mutual acknowledgement.
Cuts off Kate when she tries to swear, showing care for propriety and others present.
Calmly manages communication on CB under pressure without losing composure.
Engages playfully and confidently with Cledus over the CB radio, using nicknames and banter.
Responds nervously but politely to the threatening voice on the CB radio, attempting to gather information.
Expresses concern and shares worries with Kate about the Texas cop following them.
Checks progress and time carefully with Cledus, confirming they are ahead of schedule.
Quickly engages with an unknown CB voice issuing a warning, seeking information confidently.
Shows nervousness when confronted by the Smokey Bear voice, indicating some anxiety in an unexpected situation.
Recognizes the threat posed by a Texas cop in Arkansas and expresses concern, demonstrating awareness and situational judgment.
Decides not to delve deeper into the suspicious situation, showing cautious restraint.
Responds to the siren by immediately accelerating the car powerfully, demonstrating quick reflexes and driving skill.
Reassures Kate by telling her there's nothing to be afraid of during a dangerous high-speed chase.
Encourages Kate by asking 'Still with me?' after a dangerous stunt, showing concern for her well-being.

Drives skillfully and fearlessly alongside a huge eighteen-wheeler, executes a risky jump onto a dirt road crossing, crashes into a highway sign but recovers quickly by re-entering the highway and continuing the chase.
Survives and maintains control after smashing through a number of rural mailboxes during his jump and landing.
Confidently communicates to Kate to stay engaged after the dangerous maneuver.
Politely acknowledges and thanks Silver Tongued Devil for warning about roadblock
Engages cooperatively on CB radio, friendly exchange with fellow CB'ers
Listens carefully to CB radio warnings, acknowledges them, and uses the information to avoid roadblocks.
Grins and takes a curve at high speed shortly before encountering a roadblock.
Swerves off the highway, disrupting a farmhouse, breaking a clothesline and causing animals to scatter while evading police.
Shows intense concentration and prioritizes safety of passenger by not speaking when Kate wants to talk.

Sees a roadblock with no way around it, quickly thinks of an alternative route and executes a daring escape off-road through a farmhouse, animal pens, and orchards, successfully evading pursuing cops.
Maintains intense concentration despite his passenger's rattled state, demonstrating situational awareness and control.
Wheels the car into a controlled 360° turn to avoid running off the treacherous road at the creek where the bridge is out.
Quickly responds to the sudden end of the road and the missing bridge without panic or error.
Communicates quickly and supportively with Cledus over the CB,
Follows Cledus' suggestion and prepares to pick up food for Fred
Feels he should say something to Kate but hesitates
Oblivious to the attention Kate and he receive at the truck stop cafe
Politely engages with Kate, shakes her hand before parting ways, and shows a moment of looking back at her.
Orders simple food without condiments and interacts casually with the waitress.
Orders food quickly and clearly, specifying exactly what he wants without confusion.
Makes a polite and clear interaction with Kate, ensuring she has enough money for a ticket and showing considerate social awareness.
Looks back to check on Kate after parting ways, demonstrating attentiveness and situational awareness.
Smiles politely and refuses the waitress's seductive offer with good humor.
Notices the truckers crowding Kate and intervenes by setting down his order and moving towards them.
Observes situation carefully and intervenes when truckers are crowding Kate; calmly pays for order and maintains control of interaction with waitress.
Jokes confidently about strong coffee to maintain composure and lighten mood.
Steps between Truckers to defuse a potentially violent situation, speaks calmly despite provocation.
Signs autographs hurriedly when surrounded by admirers, showing willingness to engage with others.
Responds self-consciously and somewhat evasively about his relationship with Kate.
Accepts the owner's kindness with a smile and thanks him sincerely.
Turns back when called by the owner showing polite attention.
Notices Kate is gone and simply shrugs and leaves without complaint or anger.
Calls out to Kate in concern and tries to hold on in the car while she drives recklessly.
Questions Kate about her relationship with the pursuing sheriff without accusation, showing curiosity and trust.
Expresses disbelief that Kate would steal his car, indicating a reserved judgment but willingness to listen.
Quickly reacts to his car pulling out without him by leaping off the steps and struggling to get into the moving vehicle, showing physical ability and situational awareness.
Questions Kate about the situation and keeps calm under pressure, trying to assess the threat from the pursuing sheriff.
Shrugs and leaves when he notices Kate is gone without apparent suspicion or follow-up, indicating possible oversight or lack of vigilance.
Tells Kate she could have asked him instead of making assumptions
Smiles and shows light-hearted engagement with Kate's driving and background
Maintains composure while Kate drives aggressively on a dangerous curve at 85 mph, indicating trust in his co-driver's skills.
Uses CB radio to communicate coolly and effectively with his partner Cledus, demonstrating situational awareness and communication skills.

Responds to Kate's confession about not wanting to be left at the truck stop with a simple remark 'You could've asked,' showing social perceptiveness but perhaps a missed opportunity to anticipate needs.
Calmly communicates with Cledus while managing distractions and a pursuing officer; shows situational awareness and tries to strategize ditching the Texas Smokey.
Admits uncertainty about what the Texas Smokey wants and does not immediately evade him.
Swerves to avoid a head-on collision with a family in a camper
Suggests switching seats with Kate after the crash, but lets her keep the more comfortable seat
Recklessly drives through a funeral procession to escape the sheriff
Suggests switching seats after near head-on collision, attempts but fails to do so safely, leading to loss of control and crash.
Quickly recovers, chooses the more comfortable seat and continues driving confidently despite earlier mishap.
Performs risky maneuver crossing highway amidst funeral procession, successfully evades pursuing officer by taking unconventional route on dirt path.
Engages in light-hearted banter with Kate, showing friendly teasing.
Attempts to assert control over a risky situation by advising caution but allows Kate to take the lead.
Remains calm and observant when the path ends abruptly and a fence blocks the way, indicating awareness of the situation.
Attempts to take control by suggesting he should drive through the obstacle, showing initiative and confidence.
Allows Kate to take over driving and does not physically intervene to stop her from racing over the fence at high speed.
Uses CB radio to coordinate with Cledus, sharing friendly banter.
Engages in playful, daring driving stunts with Kate, enjoys crowd reaction.
Coordinates effectively with Cledus over the CB radio, demonstrating situational awareness and teamwork during the escape.
Disappears quickly from a narrow path by clever driving and timing, outmaneuvering Sheriff Clayton despite the sheriff's attempts to catch him.
Introduces Kate to Cledus and shares food with the dog.
Dismisses Cledus's concern about the delay without engagement.
Responds to Cledus's compliment about Kate with a lighthearted whistle, indicating casual friendliness.
Balances social interaction (introduces Kate to Cledus) smoothly while maintaining focus on the mission (asks about time and signals to leave), shows situational awareness and confidence.
Responds to Cledus' concerns but dismisses emotional objections ("Just don't worry about it.") to keep focus, indicating control and prioritization.
Runs into 'complications' changing plans (not dumping Kate as originally planned), suggesting flexibility but also deviation from original plan which could reflect a risk or lapse.
Engages in relaxed, humorous conversation with Kate, sharing personal thoughts and showing a willingness to connect.
Shrugs and avoids discussing long-term plans, showing openness and sincerity about his uncertainty.
Makes a self-deprecating joke about life's hardships and trucking, indicating a good-natured personality.
Engages in relaxed, confident conversation about his life and work, shows self-awareness and humor.
Avoids directly answering questions about his future, shows some uncertainty or lack of decisiveness.
Explains to Kate what an unmarked police car is, shows calm and reassures her.
Teases Cledus about mike fright in a lighthearted way.
Does not get angry or demanding when Cledus fails to respond immediately on the radio; remains patient.
Withholds information from Cledus by saying 'Never mind. It's nothing.', possibly to avoid worry.
Notices a broken-down car and stops to help, shares tools with Kate, works cooperatively.
Engages in playful banter with Cledus about needing a pit stop.
Notices a broken-down car and quickly takes out screwdrivers to help, calmly directing the actions with Kate.
Switches license plates to evade police detection efficiently.
Keeps contact with Bandit II and plans around the need for a pit stop confidently.
Acknowledges the Attendant's comment and responds politely with 'Yeah, I know what you mean.'
Responds to Sheriff Clayton with sarcasm rather than hostility ('if your breath is as sweet as your personality... Adios').
Calmly responds to a surprise communication from Sheriff Clayton, showing awareness and composure.
Engages in witty banter with the sheriff, demonstrating confidence and mental agility.
Refuses the attendant’s suggestion to check under the hood, indicating confidence in his vehicle's condition.
Initially relaxes with eyes closed before receiving the CB message, possibly indicating momentary overconfidence or lowered vigilance.
Compliments Kate for only smoking three cigarettes through Mississippi.
Says 'Good-byes are always tough' before making a sharp escape.
Quickly recognizes the roadblock and immediately swerves off the highway with a sliding turn.
Engages in light banter and motivates Kate while driving under pressure.
Creates his own path by driving the Cobra up and over a steep, roadless hill to escape pursuers.
Confidently maneuvers a dangerously steep and treacherous terrain, managing a high-risk downhill roller-coaster ride.
Taking curves and holding the shoulder confidently while driving in difficult conditions, adjusts to rain by turning on wipers and trying to communicate proactively via CB.
Humming along to music and calm under pressure while driving fast and managing risks.
Warns Cledus about upcoming heavy precipitation and dangerous road conditions, showing concern for safety.
Gives clear and friendly communication over the CB to support the journey.
Warns Cledus of upcoming heavy precipitation and advises him to adjust flaps accordingly on dangerous roads.
Pulls the Cobra under a clump of trees, presumably to wait and stay safe.
Engages in confident communication with Cledus over the CB, showing good situational awareness and planning.
Shows concern for Kate's safety, considers dropping her off early to avoid danger.
Shares a sincere, quiet moment with Kate, showing emotional connection.
Considers the potential danger ahead and suggests a strategic adjustment by dropping Kate in Montgomery to avoid trouble.
Shows confidence and emotional steadiness by maintaining his relationship and calm demeanor during a tense situation.
Kisses Kate tenderly in the rain, showing affection and care.
Checks on Cledus after he encounters trouble, asks if he's okay.
Responds promptly and confidently to Cledus' radio call, demonstrating effective communication and composure.
Engages in a tender moment (kissing Kate) during a high-pressure situation but quickly regains focus to communicate and proceed.
Shows readiness to continue the mission after the rough encounter, indicated by 'fires up the Cobra' and positive communication.
Comforts Kate by sharing a lighthearted comment after she reveals a painful past relationship.
Kisses Kate again when she suggests it, showing affectionate behavior.
Drives the Bandit I and II cars hard and fast on slick mountain roads, showing driving skill and confidence.
Communicates efficiently over the CB radio to coordinate with Cledus, indicating situational awareness and teamwork.
Pauses to discuss personal matters with Kate during the drive, maintaining calm and composure.
Observes traffic ahead and tries to figure out a solution to the slow-moving line of cars.
Coordinates closely with Cledus and Kate, giving clear directions and acknowledging their communication.
Confidently takes control of a dangerous driving situation, communicates clearly via CB radio, coordinates timing with Kate and Cledus to navigate around obstacles.
Swerves onto the shoulder and speeds past vehicles in a controlled manner without causing accidents.
Asks Mister B for cover and expresses gratitude for the help.
Communicates clearly and confidently over CB radio to coordinate with Mister B for cover and backup.
Executes skilled and precise driving maneuvers: floorboards through traffic, passes multiple cars oncoming, and successfully integrates into the truck convoy.
Responds calmly and effectively under pursuit by weaving expertly through traffic and exploiting openings in the convoy.
Expresses gratitude to Mister B, showing awareness of teamwork and reliance on partners.
Thanks Mister B sincerely over the CB for help.
Communicates clearly and cooperatively with Cledus to coordinate their driving.
Blasts horn to greet and acknowledge other trucks in convoy, receiving friendly responses.
Waves friendly gesture to the Alabama State Trooper.
Coordinates with Cledus via CB to execute a risky maneuver passing the convoy using the oncoming lane, signaling confidently by blasting horn to trucks that respond in kind.
Successfully eludes the Alabama State Trooper by cleverly switching highways and using the river crossing, maintaining situational awareness.
Slows down and pulls off to the side of the road near the weight station, waits calmly and communicates clearly with Cledus over the CB radio to coordinate their approach.
Selects the appropriate crystal frequency on the CB radio without confusion or hesitation, demonstrating technical skill.
Stops at the weight station as expected, showing awareness of surroundings and procedural caution.
Drives recklessly at high speed past highway patrolmen and weight station workers, causing them to dive for cover and forget about Cledus.
Lays rubber up the ramp and heads straight toward the Highway Patrolman at high speed
Whips the wheel to the right, making the Shelby Cobra roar around the Weight Station Shack on two wheels
Sees Cledus has safely returned to the highway and times his final maneuver perfectly, hitting the highway ramp doing 100 mph
Engages in a high-speed chase with the Highway Patrol, demonstrating confident and skilled driving under pressure
Swerves repeatedly to avoid head-on collisions, showing careful maneuvers to keep others safe during a dangerous chase.
Swerves onto the shoulder and back to avoid head-on collision with pickup, maintains control under pressure.
Takes a hairpin turn full out, executes a controlled four-wheel drift and accelerates through it successfully.
Outdrives and outmaneuvers pursuers causing their vehicles to crash while maintaining the lead.

Weaves in and out of traffic skillfully, uses dangerous maneuvers like going the wrong way on the expressway to escape pursuers, executes a risky maneuver to jump over the center divider ahead of pursuers.
Engages in extremely reckless driving such as going the wrong way and provoking a head-on collision situation, which endangers himself and others.
Calls Hot Pants for help, addressing her as 'sweet thing' and admitting he needs help bad.
Flies over the center divider to evade pursuers and quickly veers off the expressway onto a crossing highway to escape.
Wipes his brow but maintains focus and awareness via rearview mirror and CB radio.
Flips the CB channel to try to reach Hot Pants for help when pursued by multiple police cars.
Calls for assistance on the CB radio, openly admitting he needs help and signaling urgency.
Engages in light banter despite life-threatening chase.
Pleading with Hot Pants to help by locking off police behind him, showing reliance and trust.
Acknowledges indebtedness to Hot Pants with sincere thanks.
Jokes about dating a woman who still wears hot pants, showing a friendly, informal rapport.
Successfully convinces Hot Pants to help him despite her initial reluctance.
Calmly communicates with Hot Pants under pressure with Smokey chasing him.
Relies on Hot Pants to create a blockade with cars to slow down pursuers, showing strategic planning.
Shows confidence and control in a high-stress situation by managing communication and planning.
Successfully leads a coordinated diversion allowing Bandit I and II to have a clear, law-abiding run ahead, demonstrating strategic planning and execution.
Confidently communicates over the CB to coordinate timing and progress, showing situational awareness and command.
Acknowledges the overwhelming police presence and suggests laying down their hand to protect himself and others.
Expresses concern for Cledus's safety by noting that the police don't know Cledus exists.
Leads the pack driving aggressively despite overwhelming law enforcement presence, showing skill and confidence.
Recognizes when the situation is untenable and considers laying down their hand, showing situational awareness and good judgment.
Expresses doubt and hesitation near the end of the chase.
Leads the convoy aggressively through the police blockade, causing chaos but achieving the mission.
Leads a high-speed chase through police blockade with precision and speed, successfully crashing through entrance gate and evading cops.
Jokes about potential jail time with a hopeful and resigned tone in front of friends
Arrives with friends to support Kyle after a tense event
Engages in friendly banter with Kyle and Dickey
Successfully participates in a high-risk stunt, arriving at Kyle's box despite heavy police pursuit and a chaotic stock car crash on the track.
Jokes confidently about potential jail time, showing calm under pressure and self-assuredness.
Walks with Kate and Cledus toward the oncoming police despite impending arrest, engages in lighthearted banter with Kate
Responds to Kate's playful warning about not falling in love with an inmate with a grin, showing warmth and rapport
Reacts to Sheriff Clayton's sudden attack on him with surprise but no aggression, indicating tolerance and calmness
Passively accepts handcuffing and arrest without resistance
Walks calmly toward oncoming police despite imminent arrest, maintaining composure and humor.
Shows uncertainty and confusion when Sheriff Clayton suddenly confronts him about his daughter.
Accepts arrest without panic, demonstrating confidence under pressure.
Fails to anticipate emotional reaction of Sheriff Clayton, who faints upon confronting him.
Shows understanding and a kind perspective on Kate's father despite his flaws, admiring his determination.
Shares a light-hearted moment with Kate and Cledus while handcuffed, laughing with them.
Maintains a sincere and affectionate farewell with Kate before leaving.
Remains calm and silent when Kate guesses his thoughts, showing controlled composure.
Expresses admiration for Clayton's determination despite adversity, indicating perceptiveness and respect for resolve.
Shares a laugh with Cledus and Kate while handcuffed and arrested, maintaining morale and presence of mind.
Does not resist arrest or attempt escape, which could be seen as either prudence or passivity depending on context.
Gives the law enforcement a difficult challenge, making them chase him relentlessly.
Reassures Kate and makes a daring jump over the creek to escape police pursuit, sharing a lighthearted comment about her honeymoon.
Calmly pays at the gas station while the pursuing sheriff is distracted and makes a quick getaway by roaring out of the station unnoticed.
Confidently assesses the highway as a clear shot to the state line, showing good situational awareness.
Calls First Madame with light teasing, indicating humor and friendliness.
Tells Kate that 'she's got a heart of gold' about First Madame.
Invites Kate to join him in sleeping for a week, then responds warmly to her kiss.
Thanks Kate after she punches him playfully on the shoulder.
